item.title: Overview of Amazon RDS Proxy
item.description:
Amazon Relational Database Service Proxy (Amazon RDS)

Overview of Amazon RDS Proxy

Amazon RDS Proxy is a fully managed service proxy database for Amazon RDS that improves performance, availability, and scalability for applications using Amazon RDS or Aurora. RDS Proxy acts as an intermediary layer between your application and Amazon RDS or Aurora. RDS Proxy manages connection pooling, offloading connections to the database, and reusing existing connections to optimize resources and improve application performance.
